痆字的基本解释

痆
niè
疮痕；疮痛：“视伤悼瘢痆。”

痆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［niè］
［《廣韻》女黠切，入黠，娘。］
疮痕。

痆字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【疒字部】　痆； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页772第08
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?女黠切，音?。【廣韻】瘡痛也。【韓愈·征蜀聯句】視傷悼瘢痆。　又【字彙補】婆羅痆斯，國名。　又【集韻】尼質切，音暱。痒也。

痆字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
痆字的起名意思

暂无。

痆
Basic explanation of words
痆
niè
Sore scars; sore pains: "See the wounds and mourn the scars."
痆
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［niè］
["Guangyun" female hair cut, enter the hair, mother. ]
Sores.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Concentration] [The Department of Sui Characters] 　痆; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 772 08
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui]? Female haircut, sound?. [Guang Yun] Sore pain also. [Han Yu·Zheng Shu Lian Sentences] Regard the wounds and mourn the scars.　[Word Supplement] Bharatanatyam, the name of the country.　[Jiyun] Nishi cut, sound. Itching too.
